entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story. He is 13 years old and has not received a birthday card from anyone.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Harry's owl who has been absent for two nights. She is the only living creature in the house who doesn't flinch at the sight of Harry.

entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: Harry's cruel and neglectful relatives who have ignored his last two birthdays.

relationships.description: Harry has an owl named Hedwig.
The Dursleys neglect and ignore Harry on his birthdays.
